contract_title: Advanced Data Analytics & Business Intelligence Platform

contract_details.description: Implement comprehensive data analytics and business intelligence platform to transform raw data into actionable insights, predictive models, and data-driven decision support systems.
contract_details.background: Current data processing capabilities need enhancement to provide advanced analytics, real-time insights, and predictive modeling for better decision-making across the swarm.
objectives: Design and implement comprehensive data analytics infrastructure
Create business intelligence dashboards with real-time insights
Develop predictive analytics models for performance forecasting
Establish data quality monitoring and validation systems
Implement automated reporting and alerting based on data insights
Create data visualization frameworks for stakeholder communication
deliverables: Data analytics infrastructure with ETL/ELT pipelines
Business intelligence dashboard with real-time metrics
Predictive analytics models with validation frameworks
Data quality monitoring and automated validation system
Automated reporting system with stakeholder alerts
Data visualization library and dashboard frameworks
technical_requirements: Data processing frameworks (Apache Spark, Dask, Pandas)
Business intelligence platforms (Tableau, Power BI, custom dashboards)
Machine learning frameworks for predictive analytics
ETL/ELT tools and workflow orchestration platforms
success_criteria: Data analytics infrastructure processing 100% of system data
BI dashboards providing real-time insights to all stakeholders
Predictive models achieving 85%+ accuracy in forecasting
Data quality monitoring catching 95%+ of data issues
Automated reporting reducing manual analysis by 80%
Data visualizations effectively communicating insights to stakeholders

dependencies: Data storage and processing systems operational
Data quality standards and validation rules established
resources_required: Database systems and data warehousing solutions
Machine learning and predictive modeling frameworks
Data quality monitoring and validation systems

network_unlocks: Access to Data Analytics Working Group
